metadata.title: CVE-2016-9068 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
A use-after-free during web animations when working with timelinesresulting in a potentially exploitable crash. This vulnerability affectsFirefox < 50.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-9068` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 50.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
firefox-globalmenu - 50.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
firefox-mozsymbols - 50.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
firefox-testsuite - 50.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '50.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.2').
